text: Kare-ra wa kasoke Tadashi 〔Jin〕 o arrā to dōi ni oku. Daga kare-ra (kasoke Tadashi) wa kare ga tsukura reta mono. Mata kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa chishiki mo naku, oroka ni mo kare ni danji ya joji ga aru to suru. Kare ni tatae are. Kare hakare-ra ga dōretsu ni suru mono no ue ni, takaku oide ni nara reru
